TopicTitle: my game keeps crashing upon loading (Solved)

Articles.Content:
i keep loading ksp and as soon as i get to main menu it crashes please help! Edit: Solved.

Edited May 13, 2020 by Hadron27
It got solved

I can’t help you without some critical information like: what version of KSP are you using? What are your PC specs and do they meet the requirements? Do you have any mods installed? What operating system are you using?

If the game is crashing, there should be information about it in the log file called KSP.txt inside your KSP game folder, probably at the bottom with an exception or error recorded. Check that and if you find anything, upload the file to a file sharing site and link to it here. There are other, more detailed log files but without knowing your OS I can’t say where to look- try searching for Player.txt or output_log.txt, then upload those too.
